text:
Hello Guys, I have a question, hope you can help me
So I have a list of VIDs which are synchronized with my own database, say that I need to delete some contacts and their deals, which i've done before, but I would like to backup the whole information related to the contact

Pretty much what matters the most for me are the deals, the contact information, the companies related to the deal or contact and the engagements. What I do is get the contact info and add the engagements through the associations API, the same goes for deals and companies
but how do I backup all the email related information, even if it is not marketing email?
or where do I get the association between a contact VID and all interactions done through calls / emails with an agent?
Oh, just to confirm, I think I found it. Is this it? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/email/get_events> and just add the email on the query params and omitting the campaign?
This endpoint only works for Marketing Emails, Sales email information comes from the Engagements API <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/engagements/engagements-overview>

I did get the engagements which also covers notes, right?
I am also interested in some marketing emails, but now I have a problem. When I get the emails events for a recipient, even if the dashboard shows me that it was opened at some hour, that event is not shown on the endpoint, even if I explicitly filtered it for OPEN events only
Yes, that shows notes as well.  Can you share an example where you see an email being opened in the dashboard, but not via the API?  I’d like to look into that to see if this is a bug
Feel free to DM me if you don’t want to post details here
